items.sentence: You shouldn't wish for something like that to happen.
Tom goes to Australia three times a year on business.
Tom will probably be the last one to stop doing that.
Tom will probably be surprised to see Mary with John.
Tom will probably be the last one to leave the party.
If you could change something, what would you change?
Open the box carefully, without ruining the wrapping.
Tom started laughing loudly when he heard about that.
Without your help, we wouldn't have finished in time.
It'll be almost impossible to get this plan approved.
